p:
At this time it appears that the main protein responsible for cellular accumulation of SARS-CoV-2 is angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2)
27, 60, 61 , an enzyme that converts angiotensin II to angiotensin. ACE2 also acts as a receptor for several other coronavirus, including SARS-CoV
62, 63 . The distribution of ACE2 throughout the body and brain is discussed below.
